explains: v. 估算，计算；<非正式>料想，认为；把……看作；<英，非正式>期望，指望
wordGroup: reckon with 处理；对付；和…算帐；预料到

sentences.en: I reckon she's pulling in over $100 000.
I reckon (that) I'm going to get that job.
sentences.cn: 我认为我会得到那份工作。

sentences.en: They reckon (that) their profits are down by at least 20%.
sentences.cn: 他们估计利润至少下降了20%。
